column4: I really need your help guys, for some strange reason the X server won't start, i'm in bitchx right now.
What is it i should do?
I just got this blue box saying something about X won't being able to start.
what were you doing just prior to it happening?
that would be likely :)
what did you do?
its pretty easy via the command line
what is your backup file called?
ok..so in terminal... do   ..  sudo cp ~/Desktop/XORG.txt /etc/X11/xorg.conf
ctrl + alt + f2  or f3 or f4
then you can try doing a sudo /etc/init.d/gdm start
or even startx I suppose
sudo /etc/init.d/gdm start
or even sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart
ok..I would do a sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg then
i get an error saying xeserver-xorg is not installd
what?
thats pretty strange :)
I would say you spelt it wrong
sudo dpk-reconfigure xserver-xorg
dpk-reconfigure, command not found
sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg  ..sorry my spelling error now :)
all going now?
lucky you know how to use BitchX ;)
